title: Pu`ukoholā Heiau National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Pu`ukoholā Heiau National Historic Site 44th Annual Ho`oku`ikahi Establishment Day Hawaiian Cultural Festival      Time: 6:00 AM to 3:00 PM Location: Pelekane Beach Fees: FREE     Saturday, August 13, 2016 Pu'ukoholā Heiau National Historic Site will celebrate its 44th anniversary with the annual Ho'oku'ikahi Establishment Day Hawaiian Cultural Festival.
